thread.title: Wealden Sailability Receives Queen's Award For Voluntary Service (RYA - Royal Yachting Association)
thread.title_full: Wealden Sailability Receives Queen's Award For Voluntary Service (RYA - Royal Yachting Association) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Wealden Sailability Receives Queen's Award For Voluntary Service (RYA - Royal Yachting Association)
text: ( Source : RYA - Royal Yachting Association ) Wealden Sailability, a Sevenoaks charity that provides people with disabilities with the chance to learn to sail and sail regularly, has been presented with the Queen's Award for Voluntary Service
